```python
import os

DOCS_PATH = "./docs"
MKDOCS_YML_PATH = "./mkdocs.generated.yml"

def format_title(file_name):
    name = file_name.replace(".md", "").replace("_", " ").replace("-", " ")
    return name.title()

def generate_nav():
    nav_lines = ["site_name: ê¸ˆê°• ë°°ì›€í„°", "theme:", "  name: material", "  language: ko", "", "nav:", "  - í™ˆ: index.md"]

    for category in sorted(os.listdir(DOCS_PATH)):
        cat_path = os.path.join(DOCS_PATH, category)
        if os.path.isdir(cat_path):
            files = [f for f in sorted(os.listdir(cat_path)) if f.endswith(".md")]
            if not files:
                continue
            nav_lines.append(f"  - {category.title()}:")
            for f in files:
                title = format_title(f)
                nav_lines.append(f"      - {title}: {category}/{f}")

    return "\n".join(nav_lines)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    result = generate_nav()
    with open(MKDOCS_YML_PATH, "w") as f:
        f.write(result)

    print(f"âœ… ìë™ ìƒì„±ëœ mkdocs.yml â†’ {MKDOCS_YML_PATH}")

```
